get.summary: Evaluate permission for a given http method - path
Get Clients Channels and Operators meta data

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: The type of the authorization grant (password, refresh_token, client_credentials, authorization_code)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username/email of the user to be authenticated. Required if grant_type='password'

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user to be authenticated. Required if grant_type='password'

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: The refresh token instead of username/password. Required if grant_type='refresh_token'

parameters.name: redirectUri
parameters.description: The redirect uri if grant type='authorization_code'

delete.summary: Remove application roles by role name

get.summary: Get the verification key for jwt token signatures

scope.description: the scope of the generated token (space separated)

jti.description: the jti (JWT ID) claim in case of JWT token

token_type.description: the type of the generated token

refresh_token.description: the token used to refresh current token. Applicable for grant types: password, client_credentials, authorization_code

expires_in.description: the time in seconds of the duration of the token
